alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 11:22PM EST until February 20 at 12:24PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers... Great Miami River at Miamitown. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Great Miami River at Miamitown. * WHEN...From this evening to early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Flood waters affect homes just north of Miamitown. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 16.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:45 PM EST Thursday was 16.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.3 feet early Friday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
